text: The lad had never been in so queer a place before.  He was a lively,
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: active city boy, but the closest he had ever seen an airship was a
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: distance away and five hundred feet up in the air.  Now, with big
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: wonder eyes he stared at the strange appearing machine.  His fingers
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: moved restlessly, like a street-urchin surveying an automobile and
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: The man in charge of the place attracted his attention, too.  He had
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: only one arm and limped when he walked.  His face was scarred and he
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: looked like a war veteran.  The only battles this old warrior had
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: been in, however, were fights with the elements.  He was a famous
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "wind wagon" man who had sustained a terrible fall in an endurance
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: race.  It had crippled him for life.  Now he followed the various
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: professional meets for a living, and also ran an aviation school for
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: amateurs.  His name was John Grimshaw.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: old man put on a cap, went to the door and rather gruesomely faced
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the elements.

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: himself in a grumbling tone.  "I'll face it any time for Dashaway,
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: though.  The telegram may be important."

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Lights showed here and there in the various buildings scattered
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: about the enclosure.  The ground was wet and soft.  The rain came in
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: chilling dashes.  Old Grimshaw breasted the storm, and after half a
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mile's walk came to a hangar a good deal like the one he had left.
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: There was a light inside.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: door open with his foot and getting under the shelter, and shaking
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the rain from his head and shoulders.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: table, upon which was outspread pictures and plans of airships.  The
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: older of the two got up from his chair with a pleasant smiling face.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "Why, it's Mr. Grimshaw!" he exclaimed.
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: "That's who it is," joined in the other boy cheerily.  "Say, you're
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: welcome, too.  We were looking over some sketches of new machines,
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: and you can tell us lots about them, you know."

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: other time about those pictures.  Boy brought a telegram to Mr.
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

text: King's hangar.  It's for you, Dashaway."

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: let me know."

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: perplexity.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

text: for hydroplanes this, eh?"

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: it as long as he could.  Then he burst out impetuously:

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Fortune," the career of Dave Dashaway has been told.  The father of
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the young airman had been a noted balloonist, and when he died a
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: mean old skinflint named Silas Warner had been appointed Dave's
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: guardian.  Warner had acted the tyrant and hard taskmaster for the
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: youth.  A natural love for aeronautics had been born in Dave.  He
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: had made an airship model which his guardian had maliciously
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: destroyed.  Warner had also appropriated a package dropped
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: accidentally by a famous aviator, named Robert King, from a
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: monoplane.
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: Dave had found this package, containing money, a watch and a medal
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: greatly prized by Mr. King.  Dave resolved that this property should
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: be restored to the airman.  He got hold of the lost articles, which
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: his guardian had secreted, and ran away from home.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: After various adventures, during which he was robbed of the airman's
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: property, Dave managed to reach the aero meet at Fairfield.  He
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: found Robert King and described to him the boy thief.  The airman
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: took a fancy to Dave from the nerve and ability he showed in
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: experimenting with a parachute garment, and hired him.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: farm life for an aviation career, and secured work helping about the
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: grounds.  Mr. King sent Dave to Grimshaw for training.  The
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: biplane.  Dave made a successful demonstration, and won the
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: admiration and good will of the company.
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: In a few weeks time Dave scored a big success and won several
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: trophies.  His final exploit was taking the place of an aviator who
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

text: had fainted away in his monoplane, and winning the race for Mr.
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: King's machine.  Dave was now the proud possessor of a pilot's
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: license, and had fairly entered the professional field.

author: Rockwood, Roy

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: youth named Gregg, was found, and the property recovered.  He had
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: also got hold of some papers that belonged to Dave's father.  Gregg
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: through these had obtained a trace of a Mr. Dale, a great friend of
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

text: the dead balloonist.  He had made Mr. Dale believe he was the real
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake

text: Dave Dashaway, until he was unmasked.

author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

text: the start in his career as an airman this youth had been an enemy.
title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
author: Rockwood, Roy

title: Dave Dashaway and His Hydroplane; Or, Daring Adventures over the Great Lake
